description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军空军退役上将，作家，曾任国防大学政治委员。因涉嫌严重贪腐案于2023年被开除党籍、军籍，并据报被判处无期徒刑。
description.en: A retired general (shangjiang) of the People's Liberation Army Air Force, writer, and former political commissar of the PLA National Defence University. He was expelled from the Communist Party and the military in 2023 for serious corruption and reportedly sentenced to life imprisonment.

description.zh-cn: 中共八大元老之一，曾任中华人民共和国主席，刘亚洲的岳父。
description.en: One of the Eight Elders of the Communist Party of China, former President of the People's Republic of China, and father-in-law of Liu Yazhou.

description.zh-cn: 李先念之女，刘亚洲之妻，曾任中国人民对外友好协会会长。
description.en: Daughter of Li Xiannian, wife of Liu Yazhou, and former President of the Chinese People's Association for Friendship with Foreign Countries.

description.zh-cn: 刘亚洲之父，新四军老兵，曾任兰州军区后勤部副政委。
description.en: Father of Liu Yazhou, a veteran of the New Fourth Army, and former Deputy Political Commissar of the Logistics Department of the Lanzhou Military Region.

description.zh-cn: 刘亚洲之母。
description.en: Mother of Liu Yazhou.

description.zh-cn: 刘亚洲的二弟，中国人民解放军少将。
description.en: Younger brother of Liu Yazhou, a major general in the People's Liberation Army.

description.zh-cn: 刘亚洲的三弟，定居美国，任美国卡特中心中国项目主任。
description.en: Younger brother of Liu Yazhou, resides in the United States and serves as the Director of the China Program at The Carter Center.

description.zh-cn: 刘亚洲的四弟。
description.en: Younger brother of Liu Yazhou.

description.zh-cn: 刘亚洲的五弟，中国人民解放军空军大校。
description.en: Younger brother of Liu Yazhou, a senior colonel in the PLA Air Force.

description.zh-cn: 中国的执政党。
description.en: The ruling political party of China.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央军事委员会纪律检查委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央军事委员会纪律检查委员会
en: Discipline Inspection Commission of the Central Military Commission

description.zh-cn: 负责中国军队纪律检查工作的机构，主导了对刘亚洲的调查。
description.en: The body responsible for discipline inspection within the Chinese military, which led the investigation into Liu Yazhou.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国湖北省武汉市的综合性大学，刘亚洲与妻子李小林均为该校校友。
description.en: A comprehensive university in Wuhan, Hubei, China. Both Liu Yazhou and his wife Li Xiaolin are alumni.

description.zh-cn: 位于美国的私立研究型大学，刘亚洲曾在此担任访问学者。
description.en: A private research university in the United States where Liu Yazhou was a visiting scholar.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军国防大学

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军国防大学

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军的最高军事学府。
description.en: The highest military academy of the People's Liberation Army.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军成都军区空军

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军成都军区空军

description.zh-cn: 原中国人民解放军七大军区之一成都军区的空军部队。
description.en: The air force component of the former Chengdu Military Region, one of the seven former military regions of the PLA.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军的空军军种。
description.en: The aerial warfare service branch of the People's Liberation Army.

description.zh-cn: 中国各民族作家自愿结合的专业性人民团体。
description.en: A professional people's organization formed voluntarily by writers of all ethnic groups in China.

en: General Office of the Central Military Commission

description.zh-cn: 中央军事委员会的办事机构。
description.en: The administrative body of the Central Military Commission.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军总参谋部装甲兵装备技术研究所

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军总参谋部装甲兵装备技术研究所

description.zh-cn: 原隶属于中国人民解放军总参谋部的研究机构。
description.en: A research institute formerly under the PLA General Staff Department.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军北京军区空军政治部

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军北京军区空军政治部

description.zh-cn: 原北京军区空军负责政治工作的部门。
description.en: The department responsible for political work in the former Beijing Military Region Air Force.

nodes.id: 中国共产党第十七届中央纪律检查委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党第十七届中央纪律检查委员会
中共第十七届中央纪委
en: 17th Central Commission for Discipline Inspection of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在2007至2012年间的最高纪律检查机关。
description.en: The highest internal-control institution of the Communist Party of China from 2007 to 2012.

nodes.id: 中国共产党第十八届中央委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党第十八届中央委员会
中共第十八届中央委员
en: 18th Central Committee of the Communist Party of China

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在2012至2017年间的最高权力机关。
description.en: The highest authority of the Communist Party of China from 2012 to 2017.

description.zh-cn: 一家中国网站，曾发表文章批判刘亚洲。
description.en: A Chinese website that published articles criticizing Liu Yazhou.

description.zh-cn: 第二次国共合作期间由中国共产党领导的武装力量之一。
description.en: One of the armed forces led by the Communist Party of China during the Second United Front.

description.zh-cn: 原兰州军区的后勤保障部门。
description.en: The logistics department of the former Lanzhou Military Region.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军总参谋部

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军总参谋部
en: People's Liberation Army General Staff Department

description.zh-cn: 曾是中国人民解放军的最高军事指挥机关。
description.en: Formerly the supreme military command organ of the People's Liberation Army.

description.zh-cn: 位于美国亚特兰大的私立研究型大学，刘亚洲之弟刘亚伟毕业于此。
description.en: A private research university in Atlanta, USA, from which Liu Yazhou's brother Liu Yawei graduated.

description.zh-cn: 由美国前总统吉米·卡特创立的非政府、非营利组织。
description.en: A nongovernmental, not-for-profit organization founded by former U.S. President Jimmy Carter.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军空军的一个师级单位。
description.en: A division-level unit of the PLA Air Force.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军空军武汉基地

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军空军武汉基地

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军空军在武汉的军事基地。
description.en: A military base of the PLA Air Force in Wuhan.

nodes.id: 中国人民对外友好协会

zh-cn: 中国人民对外友好协会
en: Chinese People's Association for Friendship with Foreign Countries

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国从事民间外交工作的全国性人民团体。
description.en: A national people's organization in the PRC engaged in people-to-people diplomacy.

description.zh-cn: 位于中国浙江省的港口城市，刘亚洲的出生地。
description.en: A port city in Zhejiang Province, China, and the birthplace of Liu Yazhou.

description.zh-cn: 指西方文明中的“人道、人权、人性、民主、自由”等价值观，刘亚洲因鼓吹这些价值观而受到批判。
description.en: Refers to values from Western civilization such as 'humanity, human rights, human nature, democracy, and freedom,' for which Liu Yazhou was criticized for advocating.

description.zh-cn: 刘亚洲是李先念的女婿。
description.en: Liu Yazhou is the son-in-law of Li Xiannian.

description.zh-cn: 1972年至1975年在武汉大学外语系英文专业学习。
description.en: Studied in the English Department of Wuhan University from 1972 to 1975.

description.zh-cn: 刘亚洲于1986年5月至1987年担任斯坦福大学访问学者。
description.en: Liu Yazhou was a visiting scholar at Stanford University from May 1986 to 1987.

description.zh-cn: 1970年11月加入中国共产党，2023年被开除党籍。
description.en: Joined the Communist Party of China in November 1970 and was expelled in 2023.

description.zh-cn: 2023年，刘亚洲被开除中国共产党党籍。
description.en: In 2023, Liu Yazhou was expelled from the Communist Party of China.

relationships.source: 中国共产党中央军事委员会纪律检查委员会

description.zh-cn: 于2023年春节前后完成对刘亚洲的调查，将其双开并移交军队司法系统处理。
description.en: Completed the investigation of Liu Yazhou around the Spring Festival of 2023, resulting in his double expulsion (from the Party and military) and transfer to the military judicial system for prosecution.

description.zh-cn: 刊登署名文章，批评刘亚洲为“典型的野心家和阴谋家”。
description.en: Published signed articles criticizing Liu Yazhou as 'a typical careerist and conspirator'.

description.zh-cn: 因鼓吹西方文明的“人道、人权、人性、民主、自由”等普世价值观而受到批判。
description.en: Was criticized for advocating universal values of Western civilization such as 'humanity, human rights, human nature, democracy, and freedom'.

position.en: Deputy Political Commissar and Secretary of the Disciplinary Committee

position.en: Deputy Division-level Officer of the Political Department
